actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to create a Joint Congressional Committee on Foreign Investment Control in the United States.

summary.text: Establishes, upon enactment of the Foreign Investment Control Act of 1983, the Joint Committee on Foreign Investment Control in the United States. Requires the Committee to study the manner in which the National Foreign Investment Control Commission, established by such Act, fulfills its purposes.

titles.title: A bill to create a Joint Congressional Committee on Foreign Investment Control in the United States.
